name: Recursive Fractal Builder VR
description:
Build recursive fractal structures in VR. Be careful not to set the iterations too high. This has only been tested on HTC Vive. Let me know if it works (or doesn't) on your system.

Upcoming Features

  • Save and load your creations
  • Export 3d models
  • Save screenshots
  • Change scenery
  • Better recursion algorithm
  • Performance aware recursion
  • Grab any point on the structure (lose the balloons)
  • Variable number of recursions (more or less than two)
  • Shapes other than cubes
  • Particles
  • Animation
  • User Scale
  • UI Sounds

Feel free to give me suggestions in the comments. 

This is a creative toy like Google Tilt Brush - not a game.
